  2. Position 4, Angela Cervantes

Position 4, Angela Cervantes

Angela Cervantes has lived in the Clear Lake area for the past 20 years and moved to Seabrook with her husband and two sons six years ago after falling in love with the trails, pier, and coastal small-town charm. As a National Account Manager for a Fortune 500 company, she brings strategic leadership, business expertise, and a results-driven and fiscally conservative approach to city governance. Angela will bring innovative thinking and collaborative skills to define Seabrook's identity and drive sustainable growth while maintaining Seabrook's charm. With a strong love for community, Angela volunteers with numerous local non-profits and has advocated for her community in the state capital and with local state lawmakers. She believes in a united, forward-thinking Seabrook and is ready to serve all Seabrookians with integrity, accountability, and action.
